events.name: Semana de informática
events.description: Kid, I've flown from one side of this galaxy to the other. I've seen a lot of strange stuff, but I've never seen anything to make me believe there's one all-powerful Force controlling everything. There's no mystical energy field that controls my destiny. It's all a lot of simple tricks and nonsense. Escape is not his plan.
events.contactInfo: Em caso de dúvidas, entre em contato com informatica@ifsc.edu.br

events.name: Semana de edificacoes
events.contactInfo: Em caso de dúvidas, entre em contato com alimentos@ifsc.edu.br
